27710.「はぁはぁ……。やっと 追いついた。\n こんなに 遠かったなんて……。:
I finally caught up. I didn't realize how far
it was...

27711.「ねえ どこなの……。\n フィーヤが 身を投げた場所は どこ……？: Hey, where... where did Fiya throw herself...?

27713.「ここで 何か 感じる！\n こないだの洞くつのときと 同じだわ！！:
I feel something here! It's just like the
other day in the cave!

27714.「フィーヤ！ ここに いるの！？\n いるなら 姿を見せなさい！！:
Fiya! Are you here? If you're here, show
yourself!

27717.「だったら 答えなさい！\n なんで 私を殺そうとしているの！？: Then answer me! Why are you trying to kill me?

27718.「……なんなの？\n ふざけないで ちゃんと答えて！:
What are you... what are you doing? Stop
messing around and answer me!

27720.「……そうか。薬を飲まされて\n しゃべれなくされたんだったわね。\n 幽霊にな:
...I see. They drugged you and made you unable
to speak, didn't they? I can't believe you
turned into a ghost and stayed that way...

27721.「でも 何も 聞けなかったら\n ここまで来た 意味がないよ。\n どうすれば:
But if I don't ask anything, there's no point
in coming all this way. What should I do...?

27722.「そうだ！ 私に のりうつることは できる？\n 私の身体を使って 話せばいいの:
Yes! Can you get into me? You can use my body
to talk to me.

27723.「……怖くない 怖くない。\n 死ぬことに比べたら ぜんぜん 平気……。:
I'm not afraid, I'm not afraid. Compared to
dying, it's nothing.

27724.「ああ……なにこれ。とても 変な感じ……。: Oh...what is this? It's so weird...

27725.「自分の中に フィーヤがいるのが わかる……。: I can see Fiya in me...

27726.「来て…くれて ありが…とう……。\n 私は……フィーヤ。: Thanks... for... coming... I... am... Fiya.

27727.「ルベカ……気を……つけて。\n 命の輝きが……闇に…呑まれる……。:
Rubecca... be... careful. The spark of life...
will be... consumed... by... the darkness.

27728.「よかった。しゃべれるみたいね。: Good. It looks like you can talk.

27729.「でも 気をつけてって どういうこと？\n その死の言葉で あなたが\n 私を:
But what do you mean, be careful? I think
you're trying to kill me with those death
words.

27730.「……ちがう。私は…殺そうとなんて…してない。\n わかるだけ……死ぬ人が…わか:
No. I'm... not... trying... to... kill. I
just... know... a person who dies.

27731.「死ぬ人……命の輝き……なくなって…いく。\n 私……教えた…かった。:
The person who dies... the spark of life...
fades away. I...wanted...to...teach.

27732.「えっ……。フィーヤは その人に\n 死ぬことを 伝えたかっただけなの？:
What... Fiya just wanted to tell that person
that he was going to die?

27733.「でも フィーヤは 海に入ったダーリアさんを\n 追いかけて 殺したって……。:
But Fiya chased Mr. Dahlia into the water and
killed him.

27734.「危険……感じた。ダーリア姉ちゃん……。\n 見ているだけは もう いや…だった:
Danger...I felt it. Dahlia, I didn't want to
just watch. That's why I went to the sea...

27735.「じゃあ フィーヤは ダーリアさんを\n 助けようとして 海に……。:
Okay, so Fiya went into the ocean to try to
save Ms. Dahlia...

27736.「……ダーリアさんを殺したのは\n フィーヤじゃなかった。それが 真実なんだね。:
...It wasn't Fiya who killed Ms. Dahlia. So
that's the truth.

27737.「でも……。それじゃ 私は\n どうして 死ぬことになるの？: But... then how am I supposed to die?

27738.「私……見え…た。黒い影……恨み…怒り……。:
I... saw... it. A black shadow...
resentment... anger...

27739.「ここから北の方に…たくさんの木……。\n 大きな穴……。その中に……。:
North of here... a lot of trees... a big
hole... in the middle of it...

27740.「穴の中に 私が死ぬ原因になる\n 何かが あるっていうのね？:
You think there's something in that hole that
could cause my death?

27741.「……奥に…黒い影……見える。\n 何か……わからない……。:
I see... a black shadow... in the back. I
don't... know...

27742.「確かめにいくしかないようね。\n 原因が なんだろうと それを取り除けば\n:
I guess we'll just have to find out. Whatever
the cause, removing it may save me from dying!

27743.「ねえ <pc>。\n フィーヤが教えてくれた場所が どこなのか \n 探してみ:
Hey <pc>. Could you try to find out
where Fiya told me about this place.

27744.「私も フィーヤと 追いかけるから。\n よろしく 頼んだわよ！:
I'm going after them with Fiya. I'm counting
on you!

27745.「ここが フィーヤの言ってた場所なの？: Is this the place Fiya was talking about?

27746.「でも なんにも なさそうだけど……。:
But it doesn't look like there's anything
there.

27750.「オオオォォォ。この匂い……。\n この匂いは あの戦士の 血の匂いか……！？:
Oh-oh-oh. This smell... is this the smell of
that warrior's blood...!

27752.「わざわざ お前のほうから 出向いてくるとは。\n 殺しにいく手間が 省けたとい:
I'm surprised you came all the way out here.
I'm glad I saved you the trouble of going to
kill him.

27753.「えっ！？ 私に 言ってるの？: What? Are you talking to me?

27754.「私を殺すつもりってこと？\n いったい 何が目的なの！？:
Are you trying to kill me? What the hell do
you want?

27755.「グフゥゥゥ……。我が名は 波怨竜。\n かつて この島に君臨していた。:
My name is Wavragon. I once reigned on this
island.

27756.「だが ウェディ族の戦士に敗れ\n このような みじめな姿に 成り果てた……。:
But he was defeated by a Weddie warrior and
ended up like this, a miserable mess...

27757.「お前は その憎き戦士の血を引く娘。\n その血の匂いを 忘れるわけがない！\n:
You are the blood daughter of that hated
warrior. How could I forget the smell of your
blood? I will not fail to avenge you!

27758.「私……見た。\n この魔物が……ダーリア姉ちゃんを……\n 海に…引きずり…こ:
I...saw. This monster... dragged... my sister
Dahlia... into... the sea!

27760.「そうか。\n あの娘は ダーリアという名だったか。: I see. That girl was named Dahlia, wasn't she?

27761.「名など知らなかったが 憎き戦士の血を引く \n ウェディの女を 海に沈めてやっ:
I didn't know her name, but I had Weddie F, the blood of a hated warrior, drowned in the sea. Just before she was to be united with the
man she loved.

27763.「男の魂は 女を求めて 永遠に さまよい\n 女は 二度と 男と出会うことはない:
A man's soul wanders forever in search of a
woman, and she will never see him again. My
disappointment should have been averted!

27764.「だというのに その女は 男を見つけだし\n 天へ 昇っていきおったのだ！\n:
And yet she found him and ascended to heaven!
Oh, oh, oh, I'm so sorry!

27765.「だが こうして 憎き戦士の血を引く者を\n ふたたび 見つけた！ お前を殺して:
But now I have found the blood of my hated
warrior! He will kill you and avenge me!

27766.「憎き戦士の血…………？: The blood of a hated warrior...?

27768.「結婚式のリストに 私の おばあちゃんの\n 名前があったわ。ダーリアさんの親族:
My grandmother's name was on the wedding list.
She said she was a relative of Dahlia's.

27769.「つまり 私は ダーリアさんと\n 血が つながってるってことなんだ……。:
That means I am related to Mr. Dahlia by
blood...

27770.「この魔物に ダーリアさんは 殺された。\n レグさんが死んだのも フィーヤが死:
This monster killed Ms. Dahlia. Mr. Reg's
death and Fiya's death are all because of this
thing...

27771.「フィーヤが 警告してくれなかったら\n 私も こいつに 殺されるところだったん:
If Fiya hadn't warned me, he would have killed
me too!

27773.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。\n こいつを ギタギタに やっつけちゃって！:
Hey <cs_pchero>. Get him, get him, get him,
get him, get him!

27774.「グフフフゥ。我を倒すだと？\n そんなことが できると思っているのか。:
Guffaw. You think you can defeat me? Do you
think you can do such a thing?

27775.「我が無念を晴らすまで この怒りは 治まらぬ。\n お前の身をもって 知るがいい:
This anger will not abate until my vengeance
is avenged. I want you to know that!

27777.「こいつを ほっといたら いずれ\n 私を狙って レーンの村に やってくるよ。\:
If I don't do something about it, it's going
to come after me in Lane Village. Kill him
before he does that!

27778.「匂う……。あの戦士の血の匂いだ。\n どこだ……どこにいる……。\n 我が無念:
I smell... the blood of that warrior. Where
are you... where are you... I will not let my
regret go unforgiven...

27779.「見つけた……。見つけたぞ。\n おとなしく ここで 死ぬがいい！！: I found it... I found it. Die here in peace!

27780.「ウォォォォォォォン！！\n 身体が……身体が 崩れる……！:
Wooooooooo! My body... my body is
collapsing...!

27781.「おのれ おのれ！\n 我が無念を 晴らすまでは……。\n オオオォォン……！！:
Oh, abominable! Till I get my revenge...
ohohohoh...!

27782.「やった……。やっつけたわ！！: We did it... we defeated them!

27783.「<cs_pchero> おつかれさま。 \n あなたの おかげだわ。\n それ:
<cs_pchero> Good night. I couldn't have done
it without you. And Fiya...

27785.「じゃあ 私が 死ぬ危険は なくなったのね？\n よかった……。私 死ななくてい:
So I'm not in danger of dying? Thank God I
don't have to die!

27786.「ダーリア姉ちゃん……助けられな…かった。\n でも……ルベカ…助けられ…た。:
Sister Dahlia...I couldn't save you. But...
Rubecca... could... help.

27787.「はじめて…助けられ…た。うれ…しい……。\n 死ぬ人…わかるのに……助けられな:
For the first time...I was saved. I'm so
happy... it was very... hard... because I knew
who was dying... but... couldn't save him.

27788.「……ごめんなさい フィーヤ。\n あなたのことを ダーリアさんを殺した\n 犯:
I'm sorry, Fiya. I always thought you were
Dahlia's killer.

27789.「でも 真実は そうじゃなかった。\n フィーヤは みんなを助けようとしていたの:
But the truth was otherwise. Fiya was trying
to help everyone, and no one noticed.

27790.「もう 遅いけど……。ありがとう フィーヤ。: I know it's late, but... thanks, Fiya.

27792.「なんでも言って。私に できることなら\n どんなことでも してあげるよ。: Tell me anything. I'll do whatever I can do.

27793.「レグ兄ちゃんと…ダーリア姉ちゃんの…所へ\n 私も……行き…たい……。:
I want... to... go... to... Reg... and...
sister Dahlia's... place.

27794.「うん。わかったよ。連れていってあげる。: Yeah. All right. I'll take you with me.

27795.「さて <cs_pchero>？ 今 フィーヤが言ってた\n レグさんと ダーリ:
Well, <cs_pchero>? Now, of course you know
where Fiya was talking about Reg and Dahlia's
place, don't you?

27796.「最後の推理は <cs_pchero>に させてあげる。\n 場所がわかったら:
I'll let <cs_pchero> have the last guess. If
you find the location, could you head over
there?

27798.<pipipi_low>「来てくれたね <pc>くん。\n そう。ここが レグさ:
<pipipi_low> You came <pc>. Yes. This
is where Reg and Dahlia sleep.

27799.「フィーヤ。見える？ この慰霊碑は\n レグさんと ダーリアさんのために\n 建:
Fiya. Do you see it? This cenotaph was built
for Reg and Dahlia.

27800.「レグさんと ダーリアさんは\n ずっと 離ればなれに なってたんだ。:
Reg and Dahlia have been separated for a long
time.

27801.「でも 今は 一緒に いるはずだよ。: But I'm sure they're together now.

27803.「ふたりも こっちを…見てくれてた。\n 私……行かなくちゃ。: They were looking at me too. I... have to go.

27804.「フィーヤのこと 絶対に忘れないよ。\n あなたが 私たちに してくれたことも\:
I will never forget Fiya. I will never forget
what you did for us, or what the people in the
village did to you.

27805.「あなたのこと 全部 忘れないから！: I won't forget all about you!

27810.「以上でダーリア事件の真相は 解明されたわ。\n 真犯人も裁かれたし カンペキに:
So, we've cracked the Dahlia case. The real
culprit has been brought to justice, and the
case is now closed!

27811.「これで 私が結婚することになっても\n 村に 何か 起こったりしないはずだわ。:
Something Lacking in the village, I'm sure
nothing will happen to me when I get married.
I'll have to start working on my marriage!

27812.「忙しくなるから 少女探偵ルベカちゃんは\n しばらく お休みにしようと思うの。:
I'm going to be busy, so I'm going to take a
break from Girl Detective Rubecca for a while.

27813.「今まで ありがとう <pc>くん。\n あなたの おかげで 少女探偵ルベカちゃ:
Thank you <pc> for everything. Thanks
to you, Girl Detective Rubecca has been able
to solve a lot of puzzles!

27814.「これ 今までの お礼だよ。\n がんばって 用意したから 受け取って！:
This is for all the hard work you've done. I
did my best to prepare it, so please accept
it!

27815.「フィーヤは ふたりに会えるかな……？: I wonder if Fiya can meet them...?

27816.「ううん。絶対に会える。: No problem. I'll definitely see you.

27817.「だって 私の推理によれば\n これから ３人は ずーっと 一緒に\n 仲良く暮:
Because, according to my theory, the three of
us will be living together in harmony for the
rest of our lives!
